_header: When this good angel was sent
_description: Gospel for ‘feria via quatuor temporum’, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: When þis god angel þat was sent& To blys of heuyn ogayn was wen…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …With hir spouse both day & nightAnd honord god with al þaire might
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Feria vi quatuor temporum Euangelium secundum Lucam De exultacione precursoris in utero (rubric, f. 7va)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): I.185-190.
